description.fr: Vaincre {Summoning:11891!} et ses Bouftous. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Ajoute le sort {Spell:213547} à votre main.
description.en: Defeat {Summoning:11891!} and his Gobballs. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adds the {Spell:213547} spell to your hand.
description.es: Vencer a {Summoning:11891!} y a sus jalatós. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Añade el hechizo {Spell:213547} a tu mano.
description.de: Besiege {Summoning:11891!} und seine Fresssäcke. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Fügt den Zauber {Spell:213547} deiner Hand hinzu.
description.pt: Derrotar {Summoning:11891!} e o seus Papatudos. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adiciona o feitiço {Spell:213547} à sua mão.
